n, x = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

min_cost = sum(a)

for i in range(n):
    cost = 0
    have = [False] * n
    current_cost = 0
    
    for j in range(n):
        color = (i + j) % n
        if not have[color]:
            current_cost += a[color]
            have[color] = True

    
    num_spells = 0
    
    temp_have = [False] * n
    temp_cost = 0

    for k in range(n):
      color = (i + k) % n
      if not temp_have[color]:
        temp_cost += a[color]
        temp_have[color] = True
      if all(temp_have):
        break
      else:
        temp_cost += x
    
    min_cost = min(min_cost, temp_cost)


print(min_cost)
